publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-764 Ben Wallace: Korean War 50th Anniversary—That the Parliament notes the 50th Anniversary of the Korean War in which brave Scottish servicemen and women fought and lost their lives during the UN deployment to Korea in 1950-53 and urges that the tragedy of the war not be forgotten. Supported by: Nick Johnston*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, David Mundell*

S1M-764 Ben Wallace: Korean War 50th Anniversary—That the Parliament notes the 50th Anniversary of the Korean War in which brave Scottish servicemen and women fought and lost their lives during the UN deployment to Korea in 1950-53 and urges that the tragedy of the war not be forgotten. Supported by: Nick Johnston, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, David Mundell
